inputs.name: patient_ids
inputs.title: Patient IDs
inputs.description: Comma separated list of patient IDs that in sum contain all MUST SUPPORT elements

inputs.name: implantable_device_codes
inputs.title: Implantable Device Type Code
inputs.description: Enter the code for an Implantable Device type, or multiple codes separated by commas. If blank, Inferno will validate all Device resources against the Implantable Device profile
